mapper.select: select Ite.Itemboard_Title, I.Item_Delivery_State, P.Pay_Price, I.Item_No, S.Store_Name, Img.Thum_Img, P.Pay_Date from item i, Oorder o, Member m, Itemboard ite,Store s , Itemimg img,Pay p where O.Item_No = I.Item_No and I.Item_No = Ite.Item_No and Ite.Store_No = S.Store_No and S.Member_No = M.Member_No and Ite.Itemboard_No = Img.Itemboard_No and P.Oorder_No = O.Oorder_No
